org.drip.analytics.curve
Class CreditCurve

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.analytics.curve.CreditCurve
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bootstrapable, LiveQuote
public class CreditCurve
extends Serializer
implements Bootstrapable, LiveQuote

This class contains the baseline hazard curve holder object. This maintains term structure for recovery, the calibration instruments, calibration measures, calibration quotes, and parameters.

adblRecoveryDate - Matched array of recovery dates

java.lang.Exception - Thrown if inputs are invalid

dcEDSF - EDSF Discount Curve

aCalibInst - Array of calibration instruments
